title: ELEMENT "KEEP DISCOVERING" CHILE
description:
The Element team took the newest collection of product to Chile to discover the culture and landscape, and to ensure the products were made to endure. Watch the story unfold and win items from the collection on instagram by following @elementusa and using #keepdiscovering.

For the past two decades the one thing that has remained constant is our drive to see the world differently. Element has taken inspiration from all environments; from the top of the Andes to the streets in our own backyard. From the moment we hit the road, our ability to discover never ends, our enthusiasm for the next adventure is what drives us forward.

Edited by:
Kirk Dianda
Mark Stewart

Filmed by:
Cole Mathews
Kirk Dianda

Photography by:
Brian Gaberman

Soundtrack by:
Loren Humphrey
